column2: [IDEA-137300] Added ability to filter psi classes returned by JavaPsiFac...

column3: It adds a new method PsiElementFinder.getClassesFilter(GlobalSearhcScope). By default it returns null. Methods of JavaPsiFacadeImpl, which are used to look up classes, are changed to apply the filter if it is not null.
